channel.title: LOTRO - Hows my quality?
channel.description:
I just filmed my first video for LOTRO (lord of the rings online). Don't flame about the game or anything, the topic is clearly not titled for that. please tell me how the quality is, and if its bad, if you've got any tips on how to improve quality, please let me know. it is in HD, But HD doesnt particularly mean GOOD quality. BTW: im using Xfire to record, anything better to use, please let me know. Thanks guys
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NnyUma3151c

Get hypercam 2. Search on youtube how to make it record HD. It looks perfect, then find how to upload to HD. But your quality is OK.[/quote]

item.title: LOTRO - Hows my quality?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:4, topic:361873”]Laggy gameplay, add content of just things you do in-game, like mini 5 second scenes of battling or questing.

Quality is good, video’s alright.

:|, and I never use HD, it just lags my PC because graphics card is shit.[/quote]

ty 4 feedback

item.title: LOTRO - Hows my quality?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

first, let me answer your question - NO

second, IDK because all the people on youtube and shit have fucking 1080p HD quality and get tons of fans and subscribers, im wondering if i need REALLY good quality for fans and subscribers, or is it ok to have decent quality.

Read full topic
